message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SY, cs.IT, cs.NE 

The paper discusses statistical inference methods in machine learning, which is a topic that falls under the umbrella of several CS sub-categories. Based on the abstract, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), as the paper focuses on improving existing inference algorithms. The next likely sub-categories are cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.SY (Systems and Control), as the paper discusses the limitations of current methods and proposes a novel hybrid approach. The paper also mentions optimisation, which falls under cs.IT (Information Theory), and the use of MCMC and VI, which are commonly used in cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing).
